offence_circumstances: Fail to, when processing food, take all necessary steps to prevent the likelihood of food being contaminated
Fail to store food in such a way that it is protected from the likelihood of contamination
Fail to maintain at or near each hand washing facility a supply of - warm running water and single use towels
Fail to maintain the food premises to the required standard of cleanliness
Fail to maintain all fixtures, fittings and equipment to the required standard of cleanliness - Previous warning given
Fail to ensure food contact surfaces of equipment is in a clean and sanitary condition
Fail to maintain premises, fixtures, fittings, and equipment in a good state of repair and working order having regard to their use - Previous warning given
Fail to take all practicable measures to eradicate and prevent the harbourage of pests - Previous warning given
Fail to ensure hand washing facilities are only used for the washing of hands, arms and face - Previous warnings given
Fail to display potentially hazardous food under temperature control - Previous warnings given
Fail to store food in such a way that it is protected from the likelihood of contamination - Previous warning given
Fail to store food in such a way that it is protected from the likelihood of contamination
Fail to store potentially hazardous food under temperature control

Fail to, when processing food where a process step is needed to reduce to safe levels any pathogens that may be present in the food - use a process step that is reasonably known to achieve the microbiological safety of the food
Fail to maintain easily accessible hand washing facilities on the food premises - and a supply of warm running water, soap and single use towels. Previous warnings given.
Fail to store food in such a way that it is protected from the likelihood of contamination
Fail to display potentially hazardous food under temperature control
Fail to maintain at or near each hand washing facility a supply of - soap or other items that may be used to thoroughly clean hands. Previous warnings given
Fail to ensure hand washing facilities are only used for the washing of hands, arms and face -  and fail to maintain a supply of soap and single use towels.
Fail to store potentially hazardous food under temperature control
Fail to ensure copy of the food safety supervisor certificate is kept on the premises and produced for inspection on request by an authorised officer
Fail to take all practicable measures to eradicate and prevent the harbourage of pests
